title: Dungeon Siege 2 - Broken Sword Mac
description:
Dungeon Siege 2 - Broken Sword for Mac

Tested on these

iMacWhite  - Intel Core Duo
             ATI Radeon 1600
             10.6x
             Works flawless.

iMacSilver - Intel Core 2 Duo
             GTX 880
             10.9x
             Works flawless.

iMacSilver - I7
             GTX 660
             10.8x
             Works flawless.

iMacSilver - I7
             GTX 660
             10.9x
             Works flawless.


Game includes;

1) Dungeon Siege 2 v2.30
2) Expansion Broken Sword v2.30
3) Dungeon Siege 2 Game Manual


Known issues;

1) MiniMap works as it should, but the larger map via tap key is not centered.
2) For other video resolutions, the read me file explains how to change it.
3) Mouse disappears when at edge of screen, but becomes visible again when away from the edge, so nothing to worry about while playing.
4) Lan does not seem to work, you see your buddies but game does not start.

Hints;
1) Use the MiniMap instead of the tap key map
2) Change the save key to command S to conform to Mac like atmosphere.
3) Command Q quits the game, does not save the game.
4) Don't forget to save your game.
5) Use the Party Equip key to change spells and weapons on the fly.  I changed the      hotkeys for those using 0 to 9 keys.
